nl.esciencecenter.xenon

Class XenonException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.XenonException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeNotSupportedException, CertificateNotFoundException, DirectoryNotEmptyException, FileSystemClosedException, IllegalSourcePathException, IllegalTargetPathException, IncompatibleVersionException, IncompleteJobDescriptionException, InvalidCopyOptionsException, InvalidCredentialException, InvalidJobDescriptionException, InvalidLocationException, InvalidOpenOptionsException, InvalidPropertyException, InvalidResumeTargetException, InvalidSchemeException, JobCanceledException, NoSuchCopyException, NoSuchJobException, NoSuchPathException, NoSuchQueueException, NoSuchSchedulerException, NoSuchXenonException, PathAlreadyExistsException, UnknownPropertyException, UnsupportedJobDescriptionException

    public class XenonException
extends java.lang.Exception
    XenonException is the parent exception for all exceptions raised in Xenon. Next to the regular exception message and cause, XenonException add a source adaptor name to all exceptions.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
